name: Cubes Mayhem
description:
Find the end in a world with randomly generated cubes. You time is limited, but you can go fast, you can have a large field of view, and you see the end cube through the walls.

Commands: R,D,F,G, mouse, mouse scroll, SPACE

Requirements: some less than 7 years old computer, preferentially with a dedicated graphic card and any Windows (from 98 to 8 included), or Linux
